## ðŸ›  Install

### npm or yarn

Install the `@zk-kit/types` package with npm:

```bash
npm i @zk-kit/types
```

or yarn:

```bash
yarn add @zk-kit/types
```

## ðŸ“œ Usage

**Import**

```typescript
import { Identity, IProof, MerkleProof } from "@zk-kit/types"
```
